Call for AI Governance

Artificial Intelligence has transformed business operations globally, yielding a productivity dividend. Generative and Agentic AI will further enhance person-machine interaction, streamline processes, and deliver new capabilities. The discussion shifts from whether AI delivers value to how much, by when, and at what cost. Clear governance structures, quality management systems, and risk management are essential to mitigate costs associated with poor AI development or operation.

Key Concepts:

  • Business Value of AI
  • Costs of AI Implementation
  • AI Quality Management
  • AI Risk Management
  • Comprehensive Technical Documentation
  • Stringent Approval Processes
  • Risk Classification
  • Business Continuity Risks
  • Operational Efficiency
AI Governance Artificial Intelligence Generative AI Agentic AI Quality Management System Conformity Assessment Declaration of Conformity Technical Documentation
